The 'Lab' (, ) is a river in the north-eastern part of Kosovo. The long
right tributary to the Sitnica river, it is the main river in the Malo
Kosovo depression. Near its origin are remains of medieval palace of Serbian
king Milutin (1282-1321) called Vrhlab (Serbian: ÐÑÑÐ»Ð°Ð±, which means origin
of the Lab).
